member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_2DREGION
member.summary: The DISPLAYCONFIG_2DREGION structure represents a point or an offset in a two-dimensional space.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_2DREGION.cx
member.summary: The horizontal component of the point or offset.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_2DREGION.cy
member.summary: The vertical component of the point or offset.
